website_summaries.verdict: An affordable lacrosse goal. Easy to construct with snap together frame that is durable and sturdy.
pros: The reinforced 3 millimeter polyester blend netting and lacing cord are hard wearing and durable
Easy to assemble, 6-foot frame snaps together

customer_reviews.title: A good option for the back yard.
customer_reviews.text: A great net for back-yard use. Pros: Easy to assemble and disassemble, especially if you know what a lacrosse goal is supposed to look like in the first place. Sturdy enough for shooting and goalie practice. Aluminum frame has withstood two seasons plus a Wisconsin winter in between (stored outside). Light enough to move around for mowing, etc. Cons: The included net is really not sized well. You're going to work to stretch it into place. Paint is fading in its 2nd year. This is minor when it comes down to it, but worth mentioning. I wouldn't recommend it for team or game use, but that's not what it's intended for in the first place.
customer_reviews.author: GriffinDoor

customer_reviews.title: No Issues, Sees Regular to Heavy Use from HS Age Boys
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble. After reading other reviews prior to purchasing where others reported issues with having not enough rope to attach the net to the frame, I opted to use zip ties from the start. If that's the way you go with your assembly, make sure you go heavy duty on the zip ties. I purchased and assembled this net in March. It has seen heavy, regular use for 7 months now not only from just my 3 boys, but their neighborhood friends as well. 2 of them are HS age so the net sees some pretty good, hard shots. No issues to speak of in that time period other than replacing zip ties that get blasted off.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Really good affordable goal.
customer_reviews.text: Replaced our folding goal. After 3 years, it just wasn’t weathering very well. It was a little time consuming to string this goal but worth it, the net behaves more like a collegiate level goal. While lightweight and easy to move, it seems very sturdy. My son averages 75 mph on his shot from 20 ft out...3 weeks of use and it seems to be taking a good amount of strain from shots to the corners and on the pipes. No tears or signs of wear with 100s of shots already logged. Very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: SBus

customer_reviews.title: Good goal for money
customer_reviews.text: This goal has to be strung all the way around. In the past we have had goals that had Velcro on the edges. This one is a little more work but does the job it is supposed to do!!
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Atkins

customer_reviews.title: skip, try another brand
customer_reviews.text: Pls do your self a favor and select a different goal. Even for a practice goal, the frame is extremely flimsy. The wind actually causes it to become askew. I haven't measure it yet, but even the net is subpar. The practice goal I was supposed to replace with this one is has netting twice as thick. If it weren't for the fact that I tossed the packaging, I would have requested a refund. >>> very poor quality
customer_reviews.author: eNuts

customer_reviews.title: Would be better if my son could hit the net!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Fairly easy to assemble, the net is a pain to string up. Took about 45 mins start to finish. Can't tell much about the durability yet as my son seems to miss it more than hit LOL!!!! But that's why I bought it for practice
customer_reviews.author: Gindo

customer_reviews.title: 3 mm netting won’t last
customer_reviews.text: Decent goal but our net degraded rapidly in the outdoor environment. Suspect the sun on the nylon weakened it to the point it tears with the slightest pressure. Had one summer out of it just fine. The second season the net broke down. I see it is 3 mm. The replacement net they sell is 5 mm or 6 mm. Why bother selling with 3 mm?
customer_reviews.author: Timothy Barnard

customer_reviews.title: Good quality net
customer_reviews.text: This net was EXACTLY what I was looking for; it is sturdily built and the net is good quality. Easy to assemble. Great price and perfect for the backyard practice sessions. Sturdy enough that I wouldn't hesitate to use it for actual team play.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: It was easy to set-up which was a plus
customer_reviews.text: This product arrived on time. It was easy to set-up which was a plus. It was exactly what my 14 year old Lacrosee player wanted. I am rating this a 4, as I won't know if it is a 5 until the first storm, to see how it holds up against the elements.
customer_reviews.author: Remy

customer_reviews.title: Great net
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with purchase. Exactly as we expected. My 11 year old son loves it and it outside more than ever shooting at the net. A little tricky to get together but not bad.
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: Net is very poor quality
customer_reviews.text: My son was thrilled to receive this Lax goal for Easter. Sadly, it is already riddled with holes and is virtually unusable as the net was of very poor quality. Please contact me to discuss a replacement net. The frame and goal itself are in excellent condition but the net could not withstand regular shooting from my high school lacrosse player. Very disappointing as it did not even last three months.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Great lacrosse goal
customer_reviews.text: This goal is great but is very time consuming to set up. YouTube video is not very clear on how to do it but one I set it up it was sturdy and performed well
customer_reviews.author: Garrett

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I put this together with my 11 yr old son. The net wasn't easy but we accomplished everything in an hour (and this was my first net to put together so there was some experimenting). My son is very happy with it. This is a solid lacross goal.
customer_reviews.author: Shirley

customer_reviews.title: A Must for LAX Players!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent LAX goal for any player! Good quality, simple to assemble, and nice net.
customer_reviews.author: Stroller Snob

customer_reviews.title: Great price and quality product
customer_reviews.text: Identical to Highschool goal. Top quality. Great price and quality product.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin C Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Replacement goals easy setup and great cost
customer_reviews.text: Bought to replace some lacrosse goals that went missing at our school. The coach was delighted with the ease of setup/teardown and how quick we were able to get them in and put together for her.
customer_reviews.author: Doc D

customer_reviews.title: Needs better instructions for stringing the net
customer_reviews.text: Needs better instructions for stringing the net; and ideally a place to tie off the ropes. Probably not a big deal if this is your third lacrosse goal, but was less that clear for a first timer.
customer_reviews.author: Antonio Garcia

customer_reviews.title: sturdy net.
customer_reviews.text: love this net. very strong and sturdy. very happy with the quality.
customer_reviews.author: Renee B

customer_reviews.title: was relatively easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: It came on time...was relatively easy to put together, the net being the biggest challenge. But overall not to difficult. The string that holds the net on is a little flimsy, you're probably better getting some zip ties or the holders they sell separately. My son loves it and uses it every day.
customer_reviews.author: Newtown CT

customer_reviews.title: Great lacrosse net!
customer_reviews.text: Great quality. My husband uses it for lacrosse. Takes time to string but once it’s done it’s perfect! Would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Kylie

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price but mine was defective
customer_reviews.text: Overall a decent goal for the price. I bought the used version from Amazon Warehouse for a discount but it was defective. I had to drill some new holes to make one of the pieces fit. After that, the setup was pretty straight forward. I just put it together today so I can’t comment on the durability. Net is thinner than I’d like so time will tell how it holds up.
customer_reviews.author: Conor M

customer_reviews.title: Nice set up, net is a little on the thin side
customer_reviews.text: Net is thinner but lasted about 6 months before ripping a hole in the net. My son is the lacrosse player and loves being able to practice shots in the back yard. Thank you seller.
customer_reviews.author: Gary T.

customer_reviews.title: Not as heavy as expected but good quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: The size and quality is nice, but I was expecting it to be heavier. It was pretty easy to put together by myself.
customer_reviews.author: Kd

customer_reviews.title: Great lacrosse net!!
customer_reviews.text: Great net!! Can't believe how inexpensive it was compared to everywhere else I looked for a lacrosse net. My 13 year old son put most of it together by himself but needed help with putting the netting on. Overall very pleased with the quality and price of this net!
customer_reviews.author: Julie O'Brien

customer_reviews.title: Did not include any string in the package
customer_reviews.text: Received sealed box from Amazon. After opening the box I noticed that the String was missing that is used to attach the netting to the frame. Very upsetting for my boys since it already took 3+ weeks to arrive. I have contacted the manufacturer but as of this writing haven't heard anything back.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Hard to string. Faded first year.
customer_reviews.text: Hard to string. Faded first year. Works well enough still.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas J Couture Jr

customer_reviews.title: I had no idea this great product was created by a 15 year old until ...
customer_reviews.text: I had no idea this great product was created by a 15 year old until I watched Sharked Tank. 6 months later the goal is still in perfect condition. Great Job young lady, Keep it up!
customer_reviews.author: Ron

customer_reviews.title: Good product. Detailed assembly
customer_reviews.text: Great quality. Shipped well and quick. Just didn’t realize I had to weave the strings through the netting and post! That took a while! But the quality seems good so far. And the size is right.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The directions were not very useful. The netting was difficult to stretch to fit ...
customer_reviews.text: Was difficult to set up. The string used to lace around the poles was not quite long enough. The directions were not very useful. The netting was difficult to stretch to fit the frame. Once we had it set up it worked as intended. The metal frame is more durable than I expected.
customer_reviews.author: Angel Schoppers

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t last long
customer_reviews.text: It only lasted about a month! My son took a shot and the lax ball went right through the net creating a whole.
customer_reviews.author: Maria Gambale

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: My son is 14 and loves it. Took a little bit to set up the net. But with the directions and the help of YouTube we got it done.
customer_reviews.author: Kate C

customer_reviews.title: Great goal at great price
customer_reviews.text: Great goal at great price, if you need a goal for practice in the yard you cant beat this deal for <$85. College players may out class the goal but negative reviews expect too much for sub $100 goal.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle

customer_reviews.title: nice quality lacrosse goal for the yard at a nice ...
customer_reviews.text: nice quality lacrosse goal for the yard at a nice price compared to what sporting stores want for them. Nice size, good quality netting and easy to put together.
customer_reviews.author: Michael P. Mcgreevy

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: The product was as described and put together by a 16 year old. It is a 2 person job. Nice quality.
customer_reviews.author: KSH

customer_reviews.title: Color Faded
customer_reviews.text: The paint faded within 3 weeks of being outside. The goal looks like its 10 years old already and I only purchased it 2 months ago. What a waste.
customer_reviews.author: Rudolph B.

customer_reviews.title: Zip Tie the ropes!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased as a gift for a LaCrosse player. Great quality and very sturdy. Easy assembly. Followed the tips and attached the rope with zip ties instead of string.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Frame is great and product is easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: Frame is great and product is easy to put together; however the net only lasted one day before ripping and became unplayable within a week.
customer_reviews.author: Justaguy

customer_reviews.title: Great quality but very tedious to put together
customer_reviews.text: Great quality but very tedious to put together. Directions aren't detailed enough. Husband had to go on you tube to see how to put together and had to go out and by plastic ties. Spent 2 hours putting together.
customer_reviews.author: Deadrea Snyder

customer_reviews.title: Good net for practice
customer_reviews.text: It was easy enough to put together although the netting was a bit off. My son and daughter have a good target for practice, its easy to move and looks fine.
customer_reviews.author: Green

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: My 13 year old daughter assembled this on her own!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble and good quality. May not stand up to elite high school or college level players, but overall good quality frame.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This goal is amazing... and for only $80? buy it, buy it now
customer_reviews.author: s1nnr

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Instructions for assembly were easy to follow. Definitely good quality
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Tripp

customer_reviews.title: A regulation net at a good price. Use it in combination with a "pass ...
customer_reviews.text: A regulation net at a good price. Use it in combination with a "pass back" net for real game simulation.
customer_reviews.author: Jack

customer_reviews.title: Great goal for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Great lacrosse goal! light enough to move around but heavy enough for my boys to shoot and not knock it over.
customer_reviews.author: R. Mark

customer_reviews.title: Works.
customer_reviews.text: It's survived by 13 yr old's infatuation with Lacrosse. Now if the rest of the family can survive too...
customer_reviews.author: T. Harrelson

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: My son uses the net to practice lacrosse during the off season. It is holding up nicely!
customer_reviews.author: Thea

customer_reviews.title: Easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: It's a Lacrosse goal. Is just what it is supposed to be. Easy to put together, and enough string to tie the netting to the poles, easily. Happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Assemble
customer_reviews.text: It was a gift for my Grandson....Easy to Assemble...he loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this net easy set up and no problems with the net ripping
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Improved her game
customer_reviews.text: Granddaughter says it has improved her game a great deal.
customer_reviews.author: Maxine

customer_reviews.title: Net doesn't last at all. Poor net
customer_reviews.text: The net has already broken, and we have had it for less than 2 weeks. The frame is great, but the net is no good.
customer_reviews.author: M. S.

customer_reviews.title: Net and everything works well. The median review is ...
customer_reviews.text: Net and everything works well. The median review is due to frayed netting other of the box. Contacted Gladiator immediately by email. Have not received a response.
customer_reviews.author: John Dilly

customer_reviews.title: ... ordered this for my grandson and he thinks it's great so what else can you say
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for my grandson and he thinks it's great so what else can you say.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth J. Pucci

customer_reviews.title: excellent value. Tedious to put together - especially the ...
customer_reviews.text: excellent value. Tedious to put together - especially the net but my daughter loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa H.

customer_reviews.title: Took a few hours to assemble the net but so far so good. My son loves using it in the back ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this in December. Took a few hours to assemble the net but so far so good. My son loves using it in the back yard.
customer_reviews.author: Kay

customer_reviews.title: it is holding up good and my daughter is extremely happy with
customer_reviews.text: Putting it together was a task. But, it is holding up good and my daughter is extremely happy with it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great quality easy to assemble and the grandsons love practicing their lacrosse shots with it.

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: It's good but it's too big I ordered this one and got a 7x7 lacrosse goal
customer_reviews.author: Bryce

customer_reviews.title: Great net Great quality about 45-60 minute set up I ...
customer_reviews.text: Great net Great quality about 45-60 minute set up I have had my net for about 1 year and it still does not have one ripe in it.
customer_reviews.author: S

customer_reviews.title: I've had this goal for a month and a half ...
customer_reviews.text: I've had this goal for a month and a half and the net is ripping multiple places along the sides and top. Do not buy this product.
customer_reviews.author: Jrock

customer_reviews.title: The 3. 0 mm net was destroyed in the ...
customer_reviews.text: The 3.0 mm net was destroyed in the first month of practice on our backyard. I suggest buying something with a stronger net.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my son to practice lacrosse. Easy to put together and he can move it around himself. Sturdy construction, very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: busyMom

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Stupid easy to put together. Durable steel, easy for two kids to move around and play hard!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product!! The price was so great I had t buy two!!
customer_reviews.author: Hashamahoody

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Stringing the net to the frame takes forever. Buy the foldable net that’s already attached!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer M.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble. It took a while to get the net strung but so far is holding up well. Very happy
customer_reviews.author: Taylor Marshall

customer_reviews.title: Getting the net on was a bit time-consuming but the finished product works and is good bang for the buck
customer_reviews.text: Not sure about the reviewers who didn't have enough twine to complete the net install. Either the manufacturer lengthened the string provided or the reviewers did something unusual. We had several feet of line left on each side (2 lines provided). Likewise the stated issue with directions. Each piece has a numbered sticker that corresponds to a clear, paint-by-numbers picture provided in the box. Goal assembly was a no-brainer. Getting the net on was a bit time-consuming but the finished product works and is good bang for the buck.
customer_reviews.author: Rob K

customer_reviews.title: This goal is fine but it's HUGE and really
customer_reviews.text: This goal is fine but it's HUGE and really, really heavy. Guess it's my fault for not looking into the details close enough. I mistakenly thought this was something that could fold away or be transported back and forth to the park for practice. If that's what you're looking for, this is NOT the product for you!! Or me :( If it's going to be in a permanent, stationary location, then it deserves higher stars cause it's extremely sturdy and solid! No flimsy here!
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: Great price for this net
customer_reviews.text: Great price for this net. Similar Goals were about twice the price. Very easy to set up the frame. The net took a bit longer to make sure it was properly tied up. The instructions were clear. My boys loved it and use it regularly.
customer_reviews.author: Juan Cervantes

customer_reviews.title: Great lacrosse goal for play/practice
customer_reviews.text: This is a very sturdy and well-made lacrosse goal. It is official size and hard-to-believe that it is lightweight. You can move this goal around - it doesn't weigh a ton like other goal post. However, the only improvement I may suggest is to make this lacrosse goal collapsible. I would like to be able to take this to a park or somewhere to play. Also, replace the rope the manufacturer suggest to use to tie the netting to the goal post. Unfortunately, you may need to purchase a separate bungee cords for this if you do not want to use the ropes. Overall, I am very satisfied with purchase.
customer_reviews.author: tebs424

customer_reviews.title: Great Value!
customer_reviews.text: Best value for the price. Solid construction and fairly easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: Lacrosse Dad

customer_reviews.title: I wouldn't recommend for high schoolers they through too hard Boys ripped ...
customer_reviews.text: Not quite the quality I was expecting Probably my fault for not investigating net gauge. I wouldn't recommend for high schoolers they through too hard Boys ripped through the net the first day Frame quality ifs fine Unit is fine as a starter or for young kids
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Welch

customer_reviews.title: Good for the $$
customer_reviews.text: Good for the money-the rope given to secure net to poles was not long enough. So you will need zip ties.
customer_reviews.author: Lou

customer_reviews.title: Fun.
customer_reviews.text: Lots of fun for the children. Practical too because it folds .
customer_reviews.author: Song weaver

customer_reviews.title: and is easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Low cost piece of equipment, and is easy to assemble. You get what you pay for, as they say.
customer_reviews.author: K. A. Cooper

customer_reviews.title: Way too much work to assemble.
customer_reviews.text: This item is not worth the money. The net must be strung to the frame, which requires a lot more energy than I am willing to expend. Pay the extra money and get a goal which is easy to set up and tear down.
customer_reviews.author: EDen

customer_reviews.title: Need Quality Check!
customer_reviews.text: horrible product. top two bars are defective and do not align to click into place. I needed this for a private practice and will need to order another one from another company.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy T.

customer_reviews.title: Mostly good
customer_reviews.text: All good, would really like a hinge on the bottom so it could fold up
customer_reviews.author: kevin hughes

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Extremely easy to put together and shipped extremely fast! More then pleased :)
customer_reviews.author: Ashlynn Waldhelm

customer_reviews.title: You Get What You Pay For
customer_reviews.text: You get what you pay for. This was on sale for 50% off. Good thing. The frame broke (minor) on set up. The net had holes in it within 12 hours. We'll take the money we saved and buy a good net.
customer_reviews.author: Greg Wilson

customer_reviews.title: very poor quality. I will most likely return although we ...
customer_reviews.text: Don't buy. assembly of the net takes hours, very poor quality. I will most likely return although we spent hours so far on assembly.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Nice cage for the money
customer_reviews.text: For the money, it’s a nice backyard cage. Went together easily and seems to be fine quality.
customer_reviews.author: Gary B

product_meta.title: Gladiator Official Lacrosse Goal Net, Orange, 100% Steel Frame, 6 x 6-Foot
product_meta.description: Practice like you play with this official size 6’x6′ lacrosse goal. This sturdy, high quality goal is made of 100% 1. 5″ diameter steel frame, and contains 20% higher steel content than competitors’ goals.
feature_bullets: 3. 0 Mm Braided Polyester Net And Lacing Cord
